item.title: 越南股市因改革希望和对贸易协议的乐观情绪而接近历史纪录
item.description: 在全面政治改革和与美国贸易协议明朗化的乐观情绪推动下，越南股票基准正逼近历史新高。【原文：Vietnam’s stock benchmark is closing in on a record high, fueled by optimism over sweeping political reforms and clarity on a trade deal with the US.】

item.title: 日本汽车制造商提高贷款利率，对家庭造成压力
item.description: 随着央行为解除三十年超宽松货币政策而采取的历史性举措惠及消费者，日本汽车制造商开始提高贷款利率，从而增加了家庭信贷成本。【原文：Japan’s automakers have begun hiking loan rates as a historic central bank pivot to unwind three decades of ultra-loose monetary policy trickles down to consumers, raising household credit costs.】

item.title: Vista 的 KnowBe4 通过直接贷款再融资降低借款成本
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Vista Equity Partners 旗下的互联网安全平台 KnowBe4 Inc.【原文：KnowBe4 Inc., a Vista Equity Partners-owned internet security platform, is cutting its borrowing costs by refinancing about $1.46 billion of private debt through the leveraged-loan market, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数纪录保持不变，亚洲交易员情绪乐观：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开盘以利好为主，美国股市维持在历史高点附近，因为投资者在巨型股财报季之前权衡了关税方面的发展。债券收益率和美元回落。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a mainly positive open, with US equities holding near all-time highs as investors weighed tariff developments ahead of the megacap earnings season. Bond yields and the dollar retreated.】

item.title: NHK 称日本贸易谈判代表即将与特朗普会晤
item.description: 日本公共广播公司（NHK）援引政府消息来源称，日本首席贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世已进入白宫，与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普讨论关税问题。【原文：Japan’s chief trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa has entered the White House to discuss tariffs with US President Donald Trump, public broadcaster NHK said citing government sources.】

item.title: 人工智能脊柱外科公司 Carlsmed 首次公开募股融资 1.005 亿美元
item.description: Carlsmed Inc. 在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 1.005 亿美元，该医疗技术公司的股票定价在市场范围内。【原文：Carlsmed Inc. raised $100.5 million in its US initial public offering, pricing shares in the medical technology company within a marketed range.】

item.title: 亚洲本币债券销售创纪录，美元面临风险
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统难以预测的政策动向推动了投资者对亚洲本币债券的需求，激发了人们对该地区的新兴趣。【原文：President Donald Trump’s unpredictable policy moves are driving investor demand for Asian local-currency bonds, spurring fresh interest in the region.】

item.title: 日元套利交易者从石破茂的选举挫败中看到机会
item.description: 去年一蹶不振的日元利差交易最终可能成为日本大选结果的最大受益者之一。【原文：The yen carry trade that crashed and burned last year may end up being one of the biggest beneficiaries of Japan’s seismic election result.】

item.title: 淡水河谷铁矿石产量因亚马逊矿山表现而上升
item.description: 巴西淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）第二季度的铁矿石产量超出预期，这主要得益于其巴西旗舰矿山创纪录的产量。【原文：Brazil’s Vale SA iron ore production in the second quarter beat estimates, driven by an output record from its flagship mine in Brazil.】

item.title: 美国制裁据称与伊朗支持的胡塞武装有关的网络
item.description: 就在也门胡塞武装分子在红海袭击货船数周后，美国对涉嫌向也门胡塞武装分子运送石油产品的两名个人和五个实体实施制裁。【原文：The US is imposing sanctions on two individuals and five entities for allegedly delivering petroleum products to Yemen’s Houthi militants, just weeks after the group assaulted cargo vessels in the Red Sea.】

item.title: 美国关税正在改变欧洲对中国投资的态度
item.description:
中国正转向在匈牙利、斯洛伐克及其他国家进行价值更高的投资。【原文：

China is pivoting to higher-value investments in Hungary, Slovakia and other nations within its growing orbit.

】

item.title: 日本面临 40 年债务出售，投票后财政担忧挥之不去
item.description: 日本首相石破茂在大选中遭遇历史性失败后，周三举行的 40 年期国债拍卖将是对投资者对超长期限债务胃口的首次考验。【原文：Japan’s 40-year government bond auction on Wednesday will be the first test of investor appetite for super-long debt following a historic election defeat for Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba.】

item.title: Figma 类似拍卖的首次公开募股利用了强劲的需求
item.description: Figma Inc. 的首次公开募股更像是一场拍卖会，而不是传统的上市，目的是使其备受期待的首次公开募股发挥最大效用。【原文：Figma Inc. is running its IPO more like an auction than a traditional listing, in an effort to wring the most out of its highly anticipated public debut.】

item.title: 围绕鲍威尔的忧虑消退，债券期权看涨押注增加
item.description: 关于唐纳德-特朗普总统最终将为美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔物色一位鸽派继任者的猜测，正在助长国债期权的看涨倾向。【原文：Speculation that President Donald Trump will eventually tap a dovish successor to Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is feeding into a bullish tilt in Treasury options.】

item.title: 巴西在法官支持卢拉税收计划后减少支出冻结
item.description: 最高法院恢复了一项税收法令的大部分内容，该法令引发了与国会的争议，并增加了财政前景的不确定性，此后巴西宣布减少今年的支出冻结总额。【原文：Brazil announced a reduction of the total amount of its spending freeze for this year after the Supreme Court reinstated the bulk of a tax decree that had sparked disputes with Congress and added to uncertainty about its fiscal outlook.】

item.title: 云计算增长乏力，汇率压力大，SAP业绩令人失望
item.description: SAP SE 公布的季度云计算和软件销售额略低于预期，因为关税不安全给这家欧洲最有价值的公司带来了压力。【原文：SAP SE reported quarterly cloud and software sales that fell just short of estimates as tariff insecurities weighed on Europe’s most valuable company.】

item.title: 特朗普关税迫使欧洲重新思考与中国的关系
item.description:
在今天的 "亚洲大视野 "播客中，我们将讨论特朗普的关税战如何改变欧盟对来自中国的投资的态度，以及这是否会拉近中欧关系。【原文：

On today’s Big Take Asia podcast, how Trump’s tariff war is changing the EU’s approach to investments from China and whether that could bring the two closer together.

】

item.title: 德州仪器发布令人失望的业绩预测后股价下跌
item.description: 汽车和工厂设备生产商的重要芯片制造商德州仪器公司（Texas Instruments Inc.【原文：Texas Instruments Inc., a key chipmaker for producers of cars and factory equipment, declined in late trading after giving a revenue forecast that fell short of the most bullish estimates.】

item.title: 人工智能蓬勃发展使美国最大电网的关键电力成本保持在创纪录水平
item.description: 由美国最大电网供电的企业和家庭将支付 161 亿美元，以确保有足够的电力供应来满足不断飙升的电力需求，包括人工智能数据中心大规模建设所带来的电力需求。【原文：Business and households supplied by the largest US grid will pay $16.1 billion to ensure there is enough electricity supply to meet soaring power demand, including that from a massive buildout in AI data centers.】

item.title: 康菲石油接近向飞轮能源出售 13 亿美元资产
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，康菲石油公司正在就以约 13 亿美元的价格将其在俄克拉荷马州的部分资产出售给持股紧密的 Flywheel Energy LLC 公司进行深入谈判，以精简其资产组合。【原文：ConocoPhillips is in advanced talks to sell some of its Oklahoma assets to closely held Flywheel Energy LLC for around $1.3 billion, as it streamlines its portfolio, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 巴拉圭将关键利率维持在 6%，此前上调了 CPI 和经济增长展望
item.description: 巴拉圭央行在上调通胀和经济增长前景一周后，将基准利率维持在 6% 不变。【原文：Paraguay’s central bank held its benchmark interest rate unchanged at 6% a week after it raised its outlook for inflation and economic growth.】

item.title: 微软裁员后为部分销售人员提供额外薪酬
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）刚刚进行了一轮影响其销售人员的裁员，正在为一些幸存者提供奖金。【原文：Microsoft Corp., fresh off a round of layoffs impacting its salespeople, is offering bonuses to some survivors.】

item.title: SharePoint黑客攻击事件引发微软网络改革热潮
item.description: 三个月前，微软公司发布了一份被称为史上最大网络安全工程项目的进展报告。【原文：Three months ago, Microsoft Corp. issued a progress report on what it described as the largest cybersecurity engineering project in history.】

item.title: SharePoint黑客攻击事件引发微软网络改革热潮
item.description: 2022年3月3日星期四，美国华盛顿州雷德蒙德微软园区外的标牌。最近几周，微软公司开始召集员工返回总部，但其重返办公室战略取决于混合工作方式。摄影师：Chona Kasinger/布隆伯格【原文：Signage outside the Microsoft Campus in Redmond, Washington, U.S., on Thursday, March 3, 2022. Microsoft Corp. has begun calling employees back to its headquarters in recent weeks, but its return-to-office strategy hinges on hybrid work. Photographer: Chona Kasinger/Bloomberg】

item.title: 波多黎各向赶走电网管理者 Luma Energy 迈出了一步
item.description: 波多黎各对负责管理该岛陷入困境的电网的美加财团 Luma Energy 发出通知，这被视为修改或毁约的第一步。【原文：Puerto Rico filed a notice against Luma Energy, the US-Canadian consortium that manages the island’s troubled power grid, in what is seen as an initial step toward modifying or breaking the contract.】

item.title: 遛狗应用 Wag！获准尝试快速退出破产程序
item.description: 遛狗服务公司 Wag！Group Co.赢得了法院许可，根据破产规则，该公司最早可在下个月削减债务，并将控制权移交给优先债权人 Retriever LLC。【原文：Dog walking service Wag! Group Co. won court permission to try to slash debt and hand control to senior creditor Retriever LLC as early as next month under bankruptcy rules that let companies speed through an insolvency case quicker-than-normal when they have the backing of creditors.】

item.title: Invenergy 将为其价值 110 亿美元的美国输电线增加天然气供应
item.description: 希望在美国中西部建设一条输电线的Invenergy公司是一家紧密控股的开发商，在面临共和党立法者因其与风能的关系而产生的反弹后，该公司正在将一家天然气厂与拟议中的价值110亿美元的美国输电项目相连接。【原文：Invenergy, the closely held developer that wants to build a power line in the US Midwest, is connecting a natural gas plant to its proposed $11 billion US transmission project after facing backlash from Republican lawmakers over ties to wind energy.】

item.title: 卡尼缓和贸易预期，称加拿大不会签署糟糕的协议
item.description: 加拿大总理试图为在未来十天内与美国达成贸易协议的期望降温，称谈判之所以困难，是因为特朗普政府不断改变其目标。【原文：Canada’s prime minister sought to cool expectations about reaching a trade agreement with the US in the next 10 days, saying the talks are difficult because the Trump administration keeps changing its goals.】

item.title: Anthelion 计划开展更多人工智能驱动的 CLO 和中间市场投资活动
item.description: 资产管理公司 Anthelion Capital 最近发行了第一笔抵押贷款债务，目前正计划每年发行约五笔此类债务，这也是该公司利用人工智能研究工具挑选各种资产和市场投资项目计划的一部分。【原文：Asset manager Anthelion Capital recently issued its first collateralized loan obligation and is now planning to issue around five of them per year, part of a plan to use artificial intelligence research tools to pick investments in a wide array of assets and markets.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉石油产量通过稀释剂狂潮抵御雪佛龙公司的退出
item.description: 自从美国迫使雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）关闭在委内瑞拉的业务以来，委内瑞拉的石油产量比预期的更有韧性。【原文：Venezuela’s oil output has been more resilient than expected since the US forced Chevron Corp. to wind down operations in the country, with a last-minute shopping spree for a key production supply helping cushion the blow.】
